title: ‘The Odyssey,’ ‘Avengers,’ ‘Spider-Man’ and More to Drive Global Box Office to $35 Billion in 2026, Gower Street Forecasts
summary: Gower Street Analytics has projected that the global box office will reach $35 billion in 2026, marking a second consecutive year of growth with a 5% increase over current estimates for 2025. The forecast would make 2026 the highest-grossing year worldwide since 2019’s $42.3 billion haul, surpassin…
